roleset.name: press, break
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to crush.01. Crush.01 is a member of VN classes carve-21.2-1, break-45.1, amuse-31.1, and subjugate-42.3. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: Some infiltrating components see in small nodular groups are crushed.
example.arg: Some infiltrating components seen in small nodular groups
